parameters.name: SC_pos_gse
parameters.description: Wind s/c position, 3 comp. in GSE coord.

parameters.name: SC_pos_GSM
parameters.description: Wind s/c position, 3 comp. in GSM coord.

parameters.name: SC_pos_R
parameters.description: Wind s/c radial distance to center of Earth, scalar

parameters.name: QF_V
parameters.description: Velocity Quality Flag: 0=OK; 2 or 130 = caution; Other values NOT VALID

parameters.name: QF_Np
parameters.description: Proton Density Quality Flag: 0=OK; 2 or 130 = caution; Other values NOT VALID

parameters.name: V_GSE
parameters.description: Solar Wind Velocity in GSE coord., 3 comp.

parameters.name: V_GSM
parameters.description: Solar Wind Velocity in GSM coord., 3 comp.

parameters.name: V_GSE_p
parameters.description: Ion Bulk Flow vector in GSE coord.,  3 comp. (speed, E/W flow, N/S flow)

parameters.name: V_GSE_plog
parameters.description: Ion Bulk Flow Speed GSE coord.(log)

parameters.name: THERMAL_SPD
parameters.description: Solar Wind Most Probable Thermal Speed = sqrt(2kT/M), scalar

parameters.name: Np
parameters.description: Solar Wind Proton Number Density, scalar (linear)

parameters.name: Np_l
parameters.description: Solar Wind Proton Number Density, scalar (log)

parameters.name: Pressure
parameters.description: Ion Dynamic Pressure (derived from mNV^2), scalar
